name: Ruby's Mansion
description:
Ruby's Mansion is a puzzle point-and-click adventure where you try to escape the mansion and uncover the mysteries along the way.  Left click to reveal information, right click to grab certain objects, and solve puzzles!

David Martinez - Programmer
Melissa Zhang - Programmer
Annie Wu - Artist
Jarod Perez - Music
Alexia Narro-Alvers - Writer and Etc.
